title: Jsoup incorrectly parsing head tags

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A confirmed bug, that we should fix

body:
With JSoup 1.11.2, when I try to parse the below HTML I get zero elements. Kotlin Code: ``` val contents = ..... val doc = Jsoup.Parse(fileContents) // the count incorrectly returns zero elements doc.head().children().count() ``` sample doc ``` ﻿ Brave New Brain
